Hey! Im Jamie

As a seasoned UX Designer/Engineer from Texas, I bring over a decade of experience to the table. I'm passionate about creating digital experiences that seamlessly blend form and function, leaving users engaged and delighted.

My approach combines a deep understanding of user behavior with a knack for elegant design and cutting-edge technology.

Aug 2021 - Feb 2024

Merit, International

- Lead UX Engineer
Jamie Crosby
Nathan Winkel
Jungmin Lee
Korey Connolly

After eight months of freelancing for Merit, I decided to return to work with my old boss and friend Nathan Winkel full time as the Lead UX Developer. Reuniting with Nathan, and joining Jungmin and Korey, I found a renewed sense of purpose and collaboration. Our shared history and collaborative dynamic have fueled our drive to tackle new challenges and deliver impactful results.

Here are some of the awesome projects that Im most proud of from my time at Merit.

Onboarding Flow

One notable project involved revamping the onboarding flow to address user concerns, particularly accidental award rejections that led to a surge in customer service inquiries.

By implementing a comprehensive redesign, we successfully reduced such calls by 19%, enhancing user satisfaction and streamlining the onboarding experience. This achievement underscored our team's commitment to solving real-world challenges and optimizing user interactions.

Kansas / Oklahoma / Ohio ESA Marketplaces

I led the research, design, and development of the ESA Marketplace for Ohio. Through thorough market analysis and user-centric design, we delivered a user-friendly platform empowering families to make informed education savings decisions. Working closely with state officials and stakeholders, we launched a robust solution, enhancing access to educational opportunities statewide.

This project was a first for the company, so it was a very collabortaive effort accros all teams in the company to make sure everything went smoothly. As of now the marketplace has been refined based on user feedback, and is in production across 3 states.

What is Merit?

Collaborating with the team, I played a key role in storyboarding and animating videos for Merit. We brainstormed ideas, crafted compelling narratives, and translated them into engaging visuals to effectively communicate the brand's message. Through iterative feedback loops and seamless coordination, we produced high-quality animated content that resonated with audiences and strengthened Merit's brand presence across various platforms.

Nov 2015 - Feb 2020

Glidr

- UX Designer / UX Engineer
Jamie Crosby
Nathan Winkel

Joining Glidr was an exciting opportunity to immerse myself in a startup environment and contribute to revolutionizing product management software. At Glidr, we adopted a fresh approach that prioritized feedback, discovery, and validation, placing product success within reach for our clients. Being part of this innovative team allowed me to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of product management, leveraging cutting-edge methodologies and technologies to drive meaningful impact for our users and stakeholders.

Glidr Teams

Collaborating closely with Nathan, we designed the Glidr Teams product, tailored for established teams poised to centralize their product knowledge and workflows within the Glidr platform. Our partnership involved understanding the unique needs of these teams and crafting intuitive features and workflows that seamlessly integrated with their existing processes. Through iterative design cycles and user feedback, we refined Glidr Teams into a robust solution that empowered teams to harness the full potential of their product knowledge and drive successful outcomes.

Talk about a full product prototype for feedback at trade shows

Glidr Motion/Animation

At Glidr, I took charge of all animation, motion, and micro interactions, infusing our product with dynamic and engaging experiences. From concept to execution, I meticulously crafted animations to guide users seamlessly through our platform. My role was instrumental in enhancing the overall user experience and setting Glidr apart in the competitive realm of product management software.

Glidr Prototype

I spearheaded the creation of a fully functioning prototype of the Glidr app using Framer. This powerful tool allowed us to bring our vision to life with interactive elements and realistic animations. We strategically utilized this prototype at trade shows to gather valuable insights into the product, enabling us to gauge user reactions and gather feedback in real-time. The prototype served as a dynamic showcase of Glidr's capabilities, helping us refine our product strategy and enhance user engagement.

glidr.io

I took full ownership of development, updates, and maintenance for Glidr.io, ensuring its continued functionality and relevance in the ever-evolving tech landscape. This encompassed everything from implementing new features to addressing bugs and optimizing performance. By staying abreast of emerging technologies and user feedback, I led the charge in refining Glidr.io into a seamless and efficient platform that met the evolving needs of our users.
